# Typography

文字排版

# Header

標題

This is h1

This is h2

This is h3

This is h4

This is h5
This is h6
  <h1>This is h1</h1>
  <h2>This is h2</h2>
  <h3>This is h3</h3>
  <h4>This is h4</h4>
  <h5>This is h5</h5>
  <h6>This is h6</h6>

.h1 heading

.h2 heading

.h3 heading

.h4 heading

.h5 heading

.h6 heading

  <p class="h1">.h1 heading</p>
  <p class="h2">.h2 heading</p>
  <p class="h3">.h3 heading</p>
  <p class="h4">.h4 heading</p>
  <p class="h5">.h5 heading</p>
  <p class="h6">.h6 heading</p>

# Display

凸顯用具大標題

Display 1

Display 2

Display 3

Display 4

  <h1 class="display-1">Display 1</h1>
  <h1 class="display-2">Display 2</h1>
  <h1 class="display-3">Display 3</h1>
  <h1 class="display-4">Display 4</h1>
